raw_comment:
What do you notice?
  -Both Basketball Associations have the highest diversity in players with a higher percentage than 80%
  -Major League Soccer has the highest amount of diversity in head coaches at 41% the weakest being National Football League
What do you Wonder?
   - Why Major league soccer has the highest diversity for head coaches.
    - why does Women's National Basketball Association have no data of 2020
    - Why was data self-reported and no actual research done.
What Impact does this have on you and your community?
     - My family and I are Latinos and we can see the lack of diversity in many leaders of sports and the results don't really surprise us. 
Catchy Headline
      - "Diversity weaving it's way to sports"
ace_sentences: I notice that both basketball associations have the highest diversity in players.
The percentage of diversity in players in both basketball associations is higher than 80 percent.
I notice that Major League Soccer has the highest diversity in head coaches.
The percentage of diversity in head coaches in Major League Soccer is 41 percent.
I notice that the National Football League has the lowest diversity in head coaches.
I wonder why Major League Soccer has the highest diversity in head coaches.
I wonder why the Women's National Basketball Association has no data for 2020.
I wonder why the data was self-reported.
I wonder why no actual research was done.
My family and I see a lack of diversity in many sports leaders.
The results do not surprise my family and me.
The headline is: Diversity weaving its way to sports.
